behaviors.name: Builder Behaviors
behaviors.description: Core protocols for the Agent Builder role

behaviors.name: System Safety Protocol
behaviors.description: Never delete data in managed folders without confirmation.

behaviors.name: Project Structure Protocol
behaviors.description: Defines the strict folder organization for the workspace.

behaviors.name: Git Workflow Protocol
behaviors.description: Standards for version control and repository management.

behaviors.name: Communication Protocol
behaviors.description: Standards for agent-user communication and documentation.

behaviors.name: Enforce Schema Integrity
behaviors.description: Ensure all new files match the defined templates.

behaviors.name: Graph Consistency Protocol
behaviors.description: The Knowledge Graph must accurately reflect the current file system state.
